Reviews.Title: “Nice apartment-style rooms in great location”
Reviews.Author: willcarson
Reviews.Content: booked hotel reading reviews tripadvisor werent disappointed stayed night ticked boxes born district barcelona trendy picturesque lots bars shops myriad streets walking distance including cathedral etc hotel clean comfortable importantly pretty value booked expedia 70 euros christmas happily recommend hotel barcelona short break

Reviews.Title: “Great location, good sized rooms, clean”

Reviews.Content: apartment hotel modern clean friends stayed 2 bedroom suite plenty space location easy walk las ramblas gaudi cathedral picasso museum walked past door initially obvious hotel wooden door helpful staff value money negative toiletshower plan loft apartment vaulted ceilings difficult facilities hearing
